column13: Food was excellent and so if that is your main thing certainly take a trip here. It is expensive for a Sushi bar, starter, 3 types of sashimi and some of the more exotic rolls could easily run a bill up to and perhaps over $50 per person before tip.It is very noisy getting to the point at times that people were almost shouting to be heard.Once the server arrived I will say that he was quite attentive, but there was no real feeling of welcome in entering the restaurant.
We love 300 East! The menu is creative and the food wholesome. We eat there every week.

column4: 127 N Tryon St Entrance at corner 5th St. & Church St. Charlotte, NC  28202
column13: My wife and I ate here for our wedding aniversary. The food was incredible! The bacon pizza is the best I have ever had and my pork chop was cut with a butter knife. My wife's chicken was juicy and well prepared. I would not, however, recommend this place for anyone looking to have a conversation. The tables are very close and the noise level is so loud that romance is out the door. Lots of large groups that were there more for the alcohol rather than the food. I would come again but only if I were with a large party looking to eat and drink the night away.

My husband and I were looking for someplace different to celebrate our anniversary. We thought we would give A Piece of Havana a try. We were pleasantly surprised. From the menu to the people, everything was enjoyable. We can't wait to come back again.

We had a great experience at Amor de Brazil. It was our first time there, and were veryimpressed as we did not know what to expect. Great food, meats were plentiful, and alwaysfresh, great salad bar. Service was very attentive. Give it a try, you won't be disappointed!
Food was not quite as good as it has been in the past but will probably return...

column4: 720 Governor Morrison Street Suite 120 Charlotte, NC  28211
column13: Food was very good as usual. However service was slow and uncertain. Three of us had the wine tasting and although the wine was good, we had to remind the server for the second and third glasses. It was like she was unaware that we had more wine coming.
We had my family birthday dinner at Bernardin's. The menu selections were wonderful, something for everyone. The wait staff was attentive and accommodating. We had a lovely evening.

We have started eating Breakfast every Sunday morning before Church at Big View. We try to sit in Kristin's section because she is so lively and has a bubbly. She takes great care of us. The food is irresistible. We have a hard time choosing because everything is so good. We Love Big View Diner.
First time at this place and with a group of 8. Food was excellent

column4: 11318 N Community House Rd Suite 200 Charlotte, NC  28277
column13: Corporate offices are nearby and I had a group in for a meeting from out of town, as am I. They offered a good diverse menu with something for everhyone from small apps that several made dinner out of to full entree meals that were very good, fresh ingredients and well prepared and presented. Service was excellent. We were there on a slow night but assume we would get as good service even if busy. Bar looked nice but I did not spend time there, several in our party who arrived early did and were complimentary to the bar staff and atmosphere.

column4: 110 North College Street The Ritz-Carlton Charlotte Charlotte, NC  28202
column13: Almost there, certainly good. Reviews saying it's bad food are hard to "digest" -- ingredients are very good, and I see a staff with ability through the open kitchen. It's just not excellent. A positive is that a two-some or a dozen can dine there easily. Dress code goes from ties to jeans and a decent shirt. It's not a white-tablecloth Ritz Carlton experience, so that has appeal. There is enough variety on the menu and the wine list (runs from normal vineyards to splurge vineyards, and not 100% California, though few older vintages). Execution is short of excellent, almost very good. Recipes may be a factor: many dishes seem intentionally modified to crowd-pleasing rather than excellence--dumbed down? Service was sincere.
Great spot to dine when going to the Blumenthal for a performance! The attention we received was excellent and the menu choices were bountiful! Everything we ordered was phenomenal!

column4: 14815 Ballantyne Village Way Suite 170 Charlotte, NC  28277
column13: Easily the best Indian food in Charlotte. Also has a surprisingly good wine list.Service was however slow.

column4: 500 S College St Suite 150 Charlotte, NC  28202
column13: My husband and I enjoy Brazilian steakhouses. This made us think of the first steakhouse with a similar name that we went to. It has a very open layout. So there wasn't much privacy from other dinners. The atmosphere is better suited for lunch. The food was good. My husbands only complaint was the low frequency of the meat coming around. Also there wasn't a lot of high end meat. For the price paid he expected more meat. But overall it was a good experience. And it is in an interesting part of the city in the Levine Art Center area.

Very bad experience. Waitress in a hurry and did not take the time to explain the non-typical ordering procedure. Bread was cold and stale. Manager argued with me when I explained my dissatisfaction. Will never go back.

column4: Ashley Park Lane Suite 108 Charlotte, NC  28210
column13: excellent food; attentive service. Well worth re-visiting. Dining area is typical cafe - not intimate but acceptable.

Three of us went there during a conference. Two of us ordered the Vegetable Wrap and they thought they were delicious. I ordered the Vegetarian Couscous. The vegetables were cooked perfectly and the couscous was tender and seasoned delectably. I would certainly return here with friends and family.
The food was great and I will probably go back. We had several servers with there own positions. Our direct waiter was not the best, but I guess for the enviroment that was to be expected.

Our family do not like Mexican food or Hispanic food that much. However, we wanted to give this restaurante a try due to good reviews. our family enjoyed this restaurant from the starts. Waiter was AWESOME. he knew what he was talking about and he knew about the menu. since we didn't know so much about the mexican style food he had to recommend pretty much all of our food. Enjoyed the guacamole appetizer, and all the other foods. Service was great. Food Awesome. we will definitely go back. I will also take my staff since they love mexican as well. It gave me different perspective on typical mexicand food.
No one does guacamole at the table like Cantina! Service was great.

I have always held CG in high regards (we have been here before) but this visit wasn't all that impressive. The wait staff was prof. but no personality and we felt like we were one table in a hundred because she never stayed at our table more than a second. She recommended the most expensive wine right...Didn't even clean the table after courses.

Carpe Diem truly is our favorite restaurant in Charlotte, outshining more expensive competitors. Their decor is intimate and romantic with stunning carved wood elements, and the food is outstanding. We have always found it to be fresh, creative and beautifully presented - and there has not been a time we have dined there when one or both of us didn't spontaneously close our eyes after taking a bite of one of their entrees and say, "Oh my gosh - this is incredible!" My husband and I both agree that although the food is amazing, the service is even better (if that's possible). Each server, as well as the managers, is knowledgeable, attentive and genuinely cares about our dining experience. So thrilled to have found this gem!
Very acceptable. Nothing amazing but consistently good.
Outstanding menu with great choices. Quality across a number of visits has been consistently high. Great dining experience and very reasonably priced.

column1: Del Frisco's Double Eagle Steak House - Charlotte
column13: This was our second visit to Del Friscos, but the first for my wife's son and his girlfriend. We were served by a delightful waiter from Ireland who had only been stateside for a few months. The food was excellent -- fresh bread with butter; a Caesar salad with gigantic croutons; a juicy, tender fillet mignon cooked just right; a crab cake with large chunks of meat (my wife's favorite criticism is "it never slept in the same block with a crab" was definitely not applicable here); family style sides of potatoes, spinach, and mushrooms; and several tempting desserts, including a New Orleans style bread pudding and a creamy cheesecake. This was an early celebration of my wife's birthday, and she later described the evening as "magical".

We found Delta’s Charlotte to be a delightful and delicious treat for all five of our senses. The ambiance is of spacious elegance, combining two large well appointed dining areas with a full length bar complete with top shelf libations and a few flat screens for the sports fanatic. The menu boasts the traditional likes of smothered Turkey Wings or Chicken, Catfish Fingers and Black Peas and Rice to your eye opening Cajun Calamari and Fried Gator. You can try everything on your first visit…. but why? Save some for your next visit and the next and the next… The fast, ever attentive and courteous service will have you thinking of Grandma’s during the holidays. Oh and there’s LIVE music… Fantastic! We have found our new dining spot….Yay!
Perfect place for business lunches. Quiet, and the wait staff is respectful. Elegent, yet not stuffy.
Dressler's gave us a complimentary champagne toast and dessert in honor of our 18th Wedding Anniversary. We had not dined with them before but will definitely dine with them in the future!

column4: 14815 Ballantyne Village Way Suite 240 Charlotte, NC  28277
column13: Loved the wine list and options. Well selected flights.

column4: 16925 Birkdale Commons Pkwy Suite F Huntersville, NC  28078
column13: Staff is friendly and well versed in the menu. Interesting choices and something for everyone! 1/2 price bottle night ROCKS! Server Hannah was super!
Nice hotel restaurant which was just want we wanted. Good food and quiet so we could do some business. The Shrimp and grits were excellent!
Food was fab! Great selection and wonderful cocktail list. Lots of options in and fun environment. Can even get comfy and watch a game in the bar.

We always have a fantastic time when we dine at Fiamma's. Yoshi was our server and made my husband's birthday dinner very special. He was very knowledgable about the wine and the menu. We have come to love this place over the past few months and it's such a treat every time we eat here, they make you feel like family!
Best in Charlotte with tons of local selections!

column4: 8708 J W Clay Blvd Charlotte, NC  28262
column13: Food was good, crying baby made the evening awful-won't go back!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Located right by Time Warner Cable arena - met friends there before we headed to see the Rush concert - we had a great night.
I have been here multiple times. Took some friends and the loved it. Great food at reasonable price!

column1: Fleming's Prime Steakhouse & Wine Bar - Charlotte
column13: This was our first visit, and the food and service were outstanding. The mozzerella and tomato salad was very good, the petite filet was cooked perfectly, and the sea bass over lobster risotta with scallops was outstanding. Our server Gary did a great job. Wonderful experience all around.
Another great meal at Fran's!!! Fantastic menu and not another "chain!" Love it!
this restaurant, inside the ballantyne resort hotel, offers very good food and service.

column4: 4620 Piedmont Row Dr. Suite 110 Charlotte, NC  28210
column13: We originally booked our party for 10 and it ended up being more than 20 - the staff handled it with grace and ease! Thank you!!
Some of the best food I've had in years. Everything was fantastic. Would definitely return and recommend to family and friends.
Fantastic mixologist... creative variable cocktailsA truly new twist on southern cusine
Great service. Warm atmosphere. Consistantly good food. All at a reasonable price.
Enjoyed a wonderful lunch catching up with old friends. A fun, comfortable place!

column4: 2127 Ayrsley Town Blvd Suite 103 Charlotte, NC  28273
column13: We had a wonderful time at Harry's. There are so many things on the menu that we want to try so we will definitely be back.

The food, the service, the presentation were all very good. The menu selection was eclectic and could accommodate all tastes. We sat out doors, it was nice but a bit busy with car traffic near an intersection, but perfect weather to sit outside. We like to share dishes and the server was very accommodating.

Absolutely our favorite experience in the metro area. It's become much more than the outstanding meals we are served when we head to Il Bosco. Service and ambiance are impeccable. Come hungry and save room for exquisite desserts!Ann & John Zientara

column4: 11508 Providence Road, Suite I Charlotte, NC  28277
column13: Love this restaurant. We will definitely go back soon.

column1: Jade Asian Fusion and Sushi Bar
column13: Excellent food! Great atmosphere.

So sorry to see that this restaurant has truly gone downhill. Great meal, then....Waited for over 30 minutes for bill..eventually meal was free, because they could never get the bill out to us, even after consulting with manager and going into the kitchen to find out the problem.
Try the fish and chips, or a burger!

Seven of us were in town for a conference, staying at the Marriott across the street. We selected the King's Kitchen based on the menu selections, positive reviews, and the mission of the non-profit restaurant. We all ordered the skillet fried chicken and thought it was outstanding. The only negative was the noise level, but then since there were 7 of us, I'm sure we contributed to it! Wait staff was very patient and attentive.
The food is always very good at La Paz. Our waiter was excellent!
Great place for a drink, snack, meal with friends or family
This was our first experience. We had a great time and my husband had a great birthday.Thank you

column4: 214 N Tryon Street, Suite 3 Charlotte, NC  28202
column13: The food and service were both excellent. Will definitely dine there again

column4: 601 South Kings Drive Suite AA Charlotte, NC  28204
column13: Mama Ricotta's is consistently wonderful. Great food!

I really like this place. This is the fifth time I dined here. The food is good, the service top notch and not overwhelming and atmosphere is warm and inviting. It's also right next to the South Park mall so you can take a stroll after dinner. We ordered the clam chowder and chopped salad to start. The chowder was excellent and the salad was huge! For our entrees, we chose the tilapia with a side of scampi,the blackened chicken linguine and the shrimp trilogy. All were really good choices. I wish the tilapia dish had a larger piece of fish but it was good and came with these delicious mashed potatoes and veggies. All in all a very good experience and we'll go back.

McCormick & Schmick's Seafood Charlotte was as advertised. While in town for the first time and a convention, my wife and I needed a place to exhale after traveling and before a week of intense scheduled activity. McCormick & Schmick's provided that perfect fit. The service as soon as we arrived was that of "their only customer". Table service - great and not overpowering, great menu, on time delicious meal. It was exactly what we were looking for.
We went here for our anniversary and it was truly special. The food is amazing, the wine list is awesome and the service is great. It is a very private and special atmosphere.

The food was good, but a bit overpriced for what was served. Server took my date's food and disposed of with out asking if she wanted it boxed up to go, she did. 18% gratuity was added for a party of two. Parking validation was not offered. Ambiance was great for a romantic night out.
Lived in Spain and have eaten paella in various places. The ingredients were good and ample. A little soupy for my taste but beat my expectations.

It was convenient being able to book reservations online and I liked that fact that an employee from Nikko called to confirm our reservations as well. I used to live in Charlotte and have eaten at Nikko four to five times before. We drove five hours to have a weekend getaway. I decided to have dinner with friends at Nikko as part of my Halloween weekend fun!!
Steak was cooked perfectly. Was bummed that Hurricane Sandy caused them to run out of tuna (not the restaurant's fault). My wife enjoyed everything as well. Very pleased!

column4: 1000 NC Music Factory Blvd Ste C-10 Charlotte, NC  28206
column13: My husband took me to Osso for the celebration of receiving my master in science. Our service was great even I accientally pushed the wine glass off the table. The owenr stopped at every table and chatted with people, which included us. He came by asked about our food and thanking us for chosen the Osso. It was quite nice.The food was good (I will give 3 1/2 stars). Both my husband and I enjoyed the salad with pork belly the best. The only negative comment about this dinning experience was I wish someone would refill my coffee (or asked if I would like to refill it).
Always excellent food and service!
Overall, weighing quality of the food, service, and value, this may be one of the best restaurants in Charlotte.

Wonderful dining experience, the waite staff were patient with us as first time diners with many questions; our waitress was extremely knowledgable about every item on the menu and answered all questions promptly. Our food was served hot and in an appropriate amount of time between courses. My only small disappointment was that I had hope it would be a little quieter prompting a bit more romanticism, as this was a surprise special occasion for my husband I would whole heatedly recommend Passion 8 to anyone up for a fantastic meal.
Not a whole lot of options for vegetarians/pescatarians.

Pewter Rose seems to have everything working well, from ambience to service to a nice variety on the menu. We started with the Mezza Platter, which was not only delicious but was a very generous serving, especially for just two people. My wife and I both had braised short ribs with root vegetables and an excellent pinot noir. This was her first trip to Pewter Rose, and my first since a lunch several years ago. It immediately jumped to the top of our date night list.

column4: 1100 E Metropolitan Ave Ste 120 Charlotte, NC  28204
column13: ample portions, tasty, knowledgeable servers
was disappointed in the food especially at the price. Service was great, margaritas were good, restaurant was VERY NOISY!

Tucked away in a neighborhood, this local favorite is perfect for a quiet dinner for 2-4 people. It has a great selection of Medterrranean specialties. I had halibut and my date had a veal dish that left us satisfied and ready to return.

column4: 111 Matthews Station Street Mint Hill, NC  28229
column13: Very good food. Portions are as they should be. Chips are very good, but salsa could use a little rework as it doesn't carry much flavor.
Fish and Chips were amazing. Potato cakes were the best I've had! Would highly recommend to anyone looking for an authentic Irish food experience.

column4: 5400 John Q Hammon Drive NW Concord, NC  28027
column13: The service could have been better, the Salmon was great. My Husband had orderd the Pork Sliders which was not great, but they were sliders, so you can't really say much about them, other than the pork was really dry and the rolls were very over cooked. He ended up just takin g the meat off of the roll. We will try to come try it one more time, but it was not the "Wow" we had expected. :/

Went to Rooster's Saturday night while staying in Charlotte. Nice place, great food, great staff and fast, efficient service. Price is in line with other restaurants. Server was attentive, held a nice conversation, and offered recommendations when requested. Would definitely go back again if I am in the area.
It was Opera Night when we went...fantastic fun, so enjoyable and what a deal. Food and opera for $40.

column1: Ruth's Chris Steak House - Charlotte - South Park
column13: We had a issue with the staff vacumning close to us due to the fact it was a slow Sunday evening. They seemed intent in getting all of their work done while there were still patrons dining. When we brought this to our waiter's attention he offered to give us free dessert.

column1: Ruth's Chris Steak House - Charlotte Uptown
column13: Loved the place!!! Took my girl for a romantic bday dinner and everything from the food to the music and ambiance was great. We will definitely be back!

column4: 130 Harbour Place Dr., Suite 120 Davidson, NC  28036
column13: Great local alternative for fusion Asian. Brought employees for a meal and the entres and sushi were a big hit.

column1: Savannah Red Restaurant and Wine Bar
column13: My daughter and I enjoyed a lovely dinner at Savannah Red. The food was excellent and the service impeccable. My daughter has severe food allergies and the chef was very accommodating. Highly recommend!

The food was excellent as usual. The waitress was inattentive however. there were several times I had to flag down a waitstaff passerby for coffee (coffee refill was served cool not hot had to send back by another waiter)Tiffany , waitress, never checked back on us to see if our steaks were cooked to our liking. Ours were but do not know about our guests.We will return because we love Sullivans. We were very disappointed in the service however from such a high end place.
I've been to Terra several times and have never been disappointed. The food is amazing and the wait staff is extremely knowledgeable. I recommend Terra whenever I can.

column4: 4625 Piedmont Row Drive Suite 105 Charlotte, NC  28210
column13: Caitlyn, our server, clearly enjoys her work and heightened our enjoyment of the occasion.

column4: 14815 Ballantyne Village Way Suite 150 Charlotte, NC  28277
column13: Our party of 6 had a wonderful dining experience on a Sunday night. Three of us had the flounder special which was scrumptious. This is a place we will definitely go back to. Nice that the Ballantyne location takes reservations at night.

Food was great. Waitress was also good. Be careful of the assistant if you turn your head he will take your plate when your half done. We had to stop him twice! It was a busy Saturday night and they wanted to turn the tables. All in all we will go back. Very Very noisey !!

column4: 3909 Providence Rd Suite A Waxhaw, NC  28173
column13: THe food is fantastic at Trattoria Antica. Where we live there are not many good restaurants without a drive to get to them. We are thrilled to have this one close by. Excellent.
There were 6 people in our group and everyone ordered something different. The food was great and so was the service. We will dine here again.

The brunch and service were the best our group found in Charlotte. The feature that was most outstanding was the inclusion of tappas with your brunch. Our waiter brought two three tiered servings to our table, so that we could try them out and make our personal selections.Drinks were prepared and served properly and coffee was fresh and hot.Buffet offered a broad selection for all tastes.

column4: 210 E Trade Street, Suite 104a Charlotte, NC  28202
column13: The only complaint I had that night is that the music was just tooo loud to visit. I understand it was a carrie underwood concert night and everyone was excited, but it was so loud that it was hard to the 4 of us to visit across the table. I don't recall that being the case when we were there two years ago.
Absolutely loved the food as did my friends. Our waiter was lovely and very busy but strived to give us good service and did a nice job. The place was packed, and that was nice.
Party of eight dining early before a play. All enjoyed their food and service was attentive without hovering. Waiter a bit pontifical about menu to suit my preference.
Enjoyed the atmosphere and the food. I had the wild mushroom pizza and the truffle oil was so good! Would prefer the use of real wine glasses, especially when a nice bottle has been ordered.
Perfect in every way!!
Good food but quite expensive compared with other similar restaurants.

column4: 4310 Sharon Road, Ste. W01| Charlotte, NC  28211
column13: Great birthday dinner!
